name: Square Max
description: Square Max is a chelated micro nutrients mixture. It plays an important role in enhancing the utilization of Nitrogen, Phosphorus and Potash in plants.
crop: Lime, Orange, Chilli, Cotton, Paddy, Mango; suitable for leafy vegetable crops and all crops

name: Square Max Pro
description: Square Max Pro (Formula 04) is a more chelated micronutrients mixture. It contains natural amino acids to obtain higher yields and helps balanced intake of Nitrogen, Phosphorus and Potash.
crop: Citrus, Chili, Cotton, Paddy, Mango; suitable for all Vegetable Crops, Fruit Gardens and all crops

name: Square 6
description: Square 6 (Formula 06) micro nutrient mixture. Enhances higher yields and plays a main role for intake of nitrogen, phosphorus, and potash.
crop: Lemon, Orange, Chilli, Cotton, Paddy, Mango, and Vegetable crops; suitable for fruit gardens
dosage: 2.5 ml to 3.5 ml per 1 liter water for foliar spray

name: Square Chilla
description: Square Chilla (Arka Z-12) contains chelated zinc 12% EDTA. Spreads immediately into plant parts and fulfills zinc deficiency due to quicker action.
crop: Cotton, Paddy, Chilly, All Vegetable Crops, all Fruit Gardens, Horticulture Crops and Citrus, Spices crops
dosage: 500 g mixed with other fertilizers per 1 acre (soil); 100 g in 100 liters water for foliar spray per 1 acre

name: Zinc 33
description: Zinc 33 (Zinc Sulphate Mono Hydrate 33%). Spreads quickly after spraying and fulfills zinc deficiency immediately to avoid damage.
crop: Cotton, maize, paddy, groundnut, soybean, all vegetable crops, all fruit gardens, horticulture crops, flower gardens, citrus crops
dosage: 1 kg mixed with other fertilizers per 1 acre (soil); 150 g in 100 litres water for foliar spray per 1 acre

name: Zinc 21
description: Zinc 21 contains Zinc 21% (raw Zinc) and Sulphur 10%. Fulfills zinc deficiency; soil application only.
crop: Cotton, chilly, paddy, orange, and other vegetable crops
dosage: 10 kg per 1 acre (use based on crop stage; soil only)

name: Square Mag
description: Square Mag (Magnesium sulphate) fulfills magnesium deficiency in all crops and enhances yields.
crop: Cotton, chilly, paddy, orange, and other vegetable crops

name: Square Boro
description: Square Boro (Boron 20%) fulfills boron deficiency, cures fruit cracking in fruit and leafy vegetables, and enhances flower production.
crop: Paddy, cotton, chilly, banana, papaya, grapes, tomato, brinjal, all vegetable crops, all fruit crops, horticulture crops, citrus species crops
dosage: 1.5–2 g per 1 liter water; 2–3 sprays at 15–20 day intervals; 500 g via drip per 1 acre

name: Square Double
description: Square Double (Formula 4) liquid micro nutrients mixture for more flowers, quality and uniform fruit size, higher yields.
crop: Paddy, Cotton, Chilly, Banana, Papaya, Grapes, Tomato, Brinjal, All Vegetables, All Fruits, Horticulture Crops, Citrus species
dosage: 2 ml per 1 liter water or 250 ml per 1 acre; mix 250 ml Gel + 250 ml Square Double in 100 liters water for foliar spray
packsize: 250 ml + 250 ml, 500 ml + 500 ml, 1 liter + 1 liter

name: Square Max Gold
description: Square Max Gold (Formula No. 7). Addresses Zinc, Manganese, Iron deficiency; improves soil compaction and contributes to higher yields.
crop: All crops
dosage: 10 kg per acre mixed with sand or other fertilizers (broadcasting)

name: Square Clean
description: Square Clean (Phosphoric acid). Increases grain size, fruit weight, shine, oil content; improves resistance to pests, diseases, and abiotic stress.
crop: All crops

name: Square Jock
description: Square Jock is an amino acid, protein-based product that increases hormone activity, supports protein synthesis, pod/coat formation, and plant immunity.
crop: All crops

name: Square Luca
description: Square Luca is an amino acid, protein-based product that increases hormone activity, supports protein synthesis, pod/coat formation, and plant immunity.

name: Square Potash

name: Square Alex
description: Square Alex effectively controls leaf spot, root rot, gemini virus, downy mildew, blight, and powdery mildew; safe for environment.
crop: All crops

name: S Max
description: S Max Micro Nutrients: essential elements for plant metabolism, enzyme functions, and yield; for prevention and cure of deficiencies.
crop: Chilli, Cotton, Paddy, Maize and other vegetable crops

name: S Zinker
description: S Zinker (Chelated zinc 12% EDTA) for quick correction of zinc deficiency.
